name: PRIMA: First Rogues
description:
Walk accross the anarchic biomes of the ether, collect skills, and upgrade them to overcome chimeras and fulfill the mission entrusted to you by your faction leader.

Explore the map, encounter chimeras, battle them, negotiate with them, interact based on the strengths of your faction. But beware, you are not alone, other powerful chimeras are here to take control of the Ether.

Features:
  • Dynamic turn based combats
  • Creat your own playstyle: Combine the features of your skills to create the playstyle that suits you best.
  • Each game is a new challenge: Discover a new map each time, and the relics and skills you collect during each game will make them unique.
